deployment_relevant_files: README.md (contains IAM and S3 bucket policy examples; AWS CLI setup instructions)
architectural_resources: Python scripts / CLI-style utilities (not a long-running service)
AWS IAM user/credentials usage via local AWS profile (configuration.py uses boto3.Session(profile_name='user1001'))
Amazon S3 bucket (hardcoded examples: s3-bucket-workshop-1001-pyday) with objects/prefixes like imagenes/
Amazon EC2 (ec2lists.py calls describe_regions/describe_availability_zones and lists running instances)
Local filesystem assets used for upload/download (images/ and images/downloaded/)
